questionTitle: The rest of us just ___ to guess at your meaning.
Everybody ___ to hand in the assignment by tomorrow.
Each of us ___ to make a speech at school tomorrow.
I ___ to think about that a little more before I answer.
Some of you will ___ to leave early.
One of you ___ to go first.
Peter and Paul ___ to stay after class.
A few of you ___ to come back afterward.
The weather ___ to improve before we can go on a picnic.
None of you ___ to stay until the game is over if you don't want to.
